Eggplant_Healthy_Leaf.simple_description: Your plant looks healthy and strong
Eggplant_Healthy_Leaf.farmer_message: ✅ Good news! Your crop is healthy

Eggplant_Leaf_Spot_Disease.simple_description: Small brown spots that look wet, usually square-shaped
Eggplant_Leaf_Spot_Disease.farmer_message: ⚠️ Found Brown Spot Disease on your plant

severity_guide.mild: Few small brown spots, plant still strong
severity_guide.moderate: Many brown spots, some leaves turning yellow
severity_guide.severe: Lots of spots joining together, leaves falling off

immediate_action: Remove spotted leaves and burn them
Clean your tools with bleach water
Don't touch healthy plants after touching sick ones
treatment: Spray copper treatment in early morning
Use clean, disease-free seeds next time
Eggplant_Leaf_Spot_Disease.when_to_worry: If spots appear on fruits or spread very fast

Eggplant_Mosaic_Virus_Disease.simple_description: Leaves show light and dark green patches like a puzzle
Eggplant_Mosaic_Virus_Disease.farmer_message: ⚠️ Found Mottled Leaf Disease on your plant
what_farmer_sees: Light and dark green patches on leaves

severity_guide.mild: Slight color changes, plant still growing normally
severity_guide.moderate: Clear puzzle pattern, some curled leaves
severity_guide.severe: Heavy mottling, twisted leaves, very slow growth

treatment: Spray for aphids and other insects
Eggplant_Mosaic_Virus_Disease.when_to_worry: This disease spreads easily - act fast
